Position Summary We are looking for a Quality Assurance Intern based at our North York Head Office for the months of May to August 2026. This role is a great opportunity to work on Quality activities for all Nestle Categories of products. You will be working daily with quality management professional and some cross-functional teams' members to strengthen quality process to ensure compliance to Nestle Standards, CFIA and Health Canada regulations A day in the life of a Quality Assurance Intern As a Quality Assurance Intern, you will be responsible for driving & sustaining successful change management through identifying opportunities to optimize product specification and quality release process while also developing the capabilities of the department colleagues and 3rd parties processes, and thinking. The key activities are the following: • • • • • Implementation of Quality Tools. Evaluation of data. Follow up of action plan and planned activities. Training to 3rd parties on the available Digital Tools with proper coaching. Support the team with daily activities as well as some specific tasks (i.e. update of bulk specifications, update list of disqualified products, etc.). • Upload and evaluation of documentation to ensure flawless product release execution. Follow up of closure of consumer complaints investigation. • Benefits • • • • Flexible and hybrid work arrangements?
